dcterms:creator: A. Shukla
P. Bhattacharya
S. Poddar
R. Mukherjee
K. Ghosh
P. Goyal
S. Ghosh
dcterms:description: The Indian Abstractive dataset (IN-Abs) consists of Indian Supreme Court judgments obtained from the Legal Information Institute of India website, totaling 7,130 case documents with corresponding abstractive summaries.
dcterms:title: Indian Abstractive dataset (IN-Abs)

dcterms:creator: A. Shukla
P. Bhattacharya
S. Poddar
R. Mukherjee
K. Ghosh
P. Goyal
S. Ghosh
dcterms:description: The Indian Extractive dataset (IN-Ext) was curated based on feedback from legal experts dissatisfied with the IN-Abs summaries. Two LLB graduates annotated rhetorical segments in 50 Indian Supreme Court case documents and provided extractive summaries for each segment.
dcterms:title: Indian Extractive dataset (IN-Ext)

dcterms:creator: J. O’Neill
C. Robin
L. O’Brien
P. Buitelaar
dcterms:description: The UK Abstractive dataset (UK-Abs) comprises 793 case documents and their official press summaries from the UK Supreme Court website, segmented into abstractive summaries.
dcterms:title: UK Abstractive dataset (UK-Abs)

dcterms:creator: G. Woods
dcterms:description: The Human Rights Documentation dataset focuses on legal cases related to human rights, particularly Article 8 of the European Convention on Human Rights.
dcterms:title: Human Rights Documentation
